pattern.name: integration_test
pattern.template:
# 1. Test plugin loading opencode --list-plugins
# 2. Test model access opencode run "test" --model=configured-model
# 3. Test skill functionality opencode run "test skill" --skill=skill-name
# 4. Test autonomous behaviors opencode run "autonomous test" --agent=autonomous-agent
# 5. Validate configuration opencode config validate

pattern.name: performance_check
pattern.template:
# 1. Monitor resource usage opencode monitor --resources
# 2. Check response times opencode benchmark --model=all
# 3. Validate autonomous behaviors opencode test autonomous --duration=300
# 4. Review error rates opencode logs --level=error --since=1h
